model_code:
def compress(s):
    if not s:
        return s
    compressed = ""
    prev_char = s[0]
    current_count = 1
    for c in s[1:]:
        if c == prev_char:
            current_count += 1
        else:
            compressed += prev_char + str(current_count)
            prev_char = c
            current_count = 1
    # Add the last run
    compressed += prev_char + str(current_count)
    # Compare lengths
    return s if len(compressed) >= len(s) else compressed
